verses.verse: And it came to pass <WH1961> in the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> year, <WH8141> in the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> month, <WH2320> in the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> that the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> take up <WH5375> a lamentation <WH7015> for <WH5921> Pharaoh <WH6547> king <WH4428> of Egypt, <WH4714> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Thou art like <WH1819> a young lion <WH3715> of the nations, <WH1471> and thou <WH859> art as a whale <WH8577> in the seas: <WH3220> and thou camest forth <WH1518> with thy rivers, <WH5104> and troubledst <WH1804> the waters <WH4325> with thy feet, <WH7272> and fouledst <WH7511> their rivers. <WH5104>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> I will therefore spread out <WH6566> <WH853> my net <WH7568> over <WH5921> thee with a company <WH6951> of many <WH7227> people; <WH5971> and they shall bring thee up <WH5927> in my net. <WH2764>

Then will I leave <WH5203> thee upon the land, <WH776> I will cast thee forth <WH2904> upon <WH5921> the open <WH6440> field, <WH7704> and will cause all <WH3605> the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven <WH8064> to remain <WH7931> upon <WH5921> thee, and I will fill <WH7646> the beasts <WH2416> of the whole <WH3605> earth <WH776> with <WH4480> thee.
And I will lay <WH5414> <WH853> thy flesh <WH1320> upon <WH5921> the mountains, <WH2022> and fill <WH4390> the valleys <WH1516> with thy height. <WH7419>

I will also water <WH8248> with thy blood <WH4480> <WH1818> the land <WH776> wherein thou swimmest, <WH6824> even to <WH413> the mountains; <WH2022> and the rivers <WH650> shall be full <WH4390> of <WH4480> thee.

And when I shall put thee out, <WH3518> I will cover <WH3680> the heaven, <WH8064> and make the stars thereof dark; <WH6937> <WH853> <WH3556> I will cover <WH3680> the sun <WH8121> with a cloud, <WH6051> and the moon <WH3394> shall not <WH3808> give <WH215> her light. <WH216>

All <WH3605> the bright <WH216> lights <WH3974> of heaven <WH8064> will I make dark <WH6937> over <WH5921> thee, and set <WH5414> darkness <WH2822> upon <WH5921> thy land, <WH776> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

I will also vex <WH3707> the hearts <WH3820> of many <WH7227> people, <WH5971> when I shall bring <WH935> thy destruction <WH7667> among the nations, <WH1471> into <WH5921> the countries <WH776> which <WH834> thou hast not <WH3808> known. <WH3045>

Yea, I will make many people amazed <WH8074> <WH5971> <WH7227> at <WH5921> thee, and their kings <WH4428> shall be horribly afraid <WH8175> <WH8178> for <WH5921> thee, when I shall brandish <WH5774> my sword <WH2719> before <WH5921> <WH6440> them; and they shall tremble <WH2729> at every moment, <WH7281> every man <WH376> for his own life, <WH5315> in the day <WH3117> of thy fall. <WH4658>
For <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> The sword <WH2719> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> shall come upon <WH935> thee.

By the swords <WH2719> of the mighty <WH1368> will I cause thy multitude <WH1995> to fall, <WH5307> the terrible <WH6184> of the nations, <WH1471> all <WH3605> of them: and they shall spoil <WH7703> <WH853> the pomp <WH1347> of Egypt, <WH4714> and all <WH3605> the multitude <WH1995> thereof shall be destroyed. <WH8045>

I will destroy <WH6> also <WH853> all <WH3605> the beasts <WH929> thereof from beside <WH4480> <WH5921> the great <WH7227> waters; <WH4325> neither <WH3808> shall the foot <WH7272> of man <WH120> trouble <WH1804> them any more, <WH5750> nor <WH3808> the hooves <WH6541> of beasts <WH929> trouble <WH1804> them.
Then <WH227> will I make their waters deep, <WH8257> <WH4325> and cause their rivers <WH5104> to run <WH1980> like oil, <WH8081> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

When I shall make <WH5414> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> desolate, <WH8077> and the country <WH776> shall be destitute <WH8074> of that whereof it was full, <WH4480> <WH4393> when I shall smite <WH5221> <WH853> all <WH3605> them that dwell <WH3427> therein, then shall they know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD. <WH3068>

This <WH1931> is the lamentation <WH7015> wherewith they shall lament <WH6969> her: the daughters <WH1323> of the nations <WH1471> shall lament <WH6969> her: they shall lament <WH6969> for her, even for <WH5921> Egypt, <WH4714> and for <WH5921> all <WH3605> her multitude, <WH1995> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

It came to pass <WH1961> also in the twelfth <WH8147> <WH6240> year, <WH8141> in the fifteenth <WH2568> <WH6240> day of the month, <WH2320> that the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> wail <WH5091> for <WH5921> the multitude <WH1995> of Egypt, <WH4714> and cast them down, <WH3381> even her, and the daughters <WH1323> of the famous <WH117> nations, <WH1471> unto <WH413> the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth, <WH776> with <WH854> them that go down <WH3381> into the pit. <WH953>
Whom <WH4480> <WH4310> dost thou pass in beauty? <WH5276> go down, <WH3381> and be thou laid <WH7901> with <WH854> the uncircumcised. <WH6189>

They shall fall <WH5307> in the midst <WH8432> of them that are slain <WH2491> by the sword: <WH2719> she is delivered <WH5414> to the sword: <WH2719> draw <WH4900> her and all <WH3605> her multitudes. <WH1995>

The strong <WH410> among the mighty <WH1368> shall speak <WH1696> to him out of the midst <WH4480> <WH8432> of hell <WH7585> with <WH854> them that help <WH5826> him: they are gone down, <WH3381> they lie <WH7901> uncircumcised, <WH6189> slain <WH2491> by the sword. <WH2719>
Asshur <WH804> is there <WH8033> and all <WH3605> her company: <WH6951> his graves <WH6913> are about <WH5439> him: all <WH3605> of them slain, <WH2491> fallen <WH5307> by the sword: <WH2719>

Whose <WH834> graves <WH6913> are set <WH5414> in the sides <WH3411> of the pit, <WH953> and her company <WH6951> is <WH1961> round about <WH5439> her grave: <WH6900> all <WH3605> of them slain, <WH2491> fallen <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> which <WH834> caused <WH5414> terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>

There <WH8033> is Elam <WH5867> and all <WH3605> her multitude <WH1995> round about <WH5439> her grave, <WH6900> all <WH3605> of them slain, <WH2491> fallen <WH5307> by the sword, <WH2719> which <WH834> are gone down <WH3381> uncircumcised <WH6189> into <WH413> the nether parts <WH8482> of the earth, <WH776> which <WH834> caused <WH5414> their terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living; <WH2416> yet have they borne <WH5375> their shame <WH3639> with <WH854> them that go down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

They have set <WH5414> her a bed <WH4904> in the midst <WH8432> of the slain <WH2491> with all <WH3605> her multitude: <WH1995> her graves <WH6913> are round about <WH5439> him: all <WH3605> of them uncircumcised, <WH6189> slain <WH2491> by the sword: <WH2719> though <WH3588> their terror <WH2851> was caused <WH5414> in the land <WH776> of the living, <WH2416> yet have they borne <WH5375> their shame <WH3639> with <WH854> them that go down <WH3381> to the pit: <WH953> he is put <WH5414> in the midst <WH8432> of them that be slain. <WH2491>

There <WH8033> is Meshech, <WH4902> Tubal, <WH8422> and all <WH3605> her multitude: <WH1995> her graves <WH6913> are round about <WH5439> him: all <WH3605> of them uncircumcised, <WH6189> slain <WH2490> by the sword, <WH2719> though <WH3588> they caused <WH5414> their terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>

And they shall not <WH3808> lie <WH7901> with <WH854> the mighty <WH1368> that are fallen <WH5307> of the uncircumcised, <WH4480> <WH6189> which <WH834> are gone down <WH3381> to hell <WH7585> with their weapons <WH3627> of war: <WH4421> and they have laid <WH5414> <WH853> their swords <WH2719> under <WH8478> their heads, <WH7218> but their iniquities <WH5771> shall be <WH1961> upon <WH5921> their bones, <WH6106> though <WH3588> they were the terror <WH2851> of the mighty <WH1368> in the land <WH776> of the living. <WH2416>
Yea, thou <WH859> shalt be broken <WH7665> in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised, <WH6189> and shalt lie <WH7901> with <WH854> them that are slain <WH2491> with the sword. <WH2719>

There <WH8033> is Edom, <WH123> her kings, <WH4428> and all <WH3605> her princes, <WH5387> which <WH834> with their might <WH1369> are laid <WH5414> by <WH854> them that were slain <WH2491> by the sword: <WH2719> they <WH1992> shall lie <WH7901> with <WH854> the uncircumcised, <WH6189> and with <WH854> them that go down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

There <WH8033> be the princes <WH5257> of the north, <WH6828> all <WH3605> of them, and all <WH3605> the Zidonians, <WH6722> which <WH834> are gone down <WH3381> with <WH854> the slain; <WH2491> with their terror <WH2851> they are ashamed <WH954> of their might; <WH4480> <WH1369> and they lie <WH7901> uncircumcised <WH6189> with <WH854> them that be slain <WH2491> by the sword, <WH2719> and bear <WH5375> their shame <WH3639> with <WH854> them that go down <WH3381> to the pit. <WH953>

Pharaoh <WH6547> shall see <WH7200> them, and shall be comforted <WH5162> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> his multitude, <WH1995> even Pharaoh <WH6547> and all <WH3605> his army <WH2428> slain <WH2491> by the sword, <WH2719> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>

For <WH3588> I have caused <WH5414> <WH853> my terror <WH2851> in the land <WH776> of the living: <WH2416> and he shall be laid <WH7901> in the midst <WH8432> of the uncircumcised <WH6189> with <WH854> them that are slain <WH2491> with the sword, <WH2719> even Pharaoh <WH6547> and all <WH3605> his multitude, <WH1995> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
